headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Metric values

primary.description: Deep Indigo for primary actions and brand identity

secondary.description: Slate 50 for backgrounds, Slate 500 for secondary text

components.cards: bg-white border border-slate-100 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-indigo-700 hover:bg-indigo-800 text-white shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-lg px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-lg px-3 py-1.5 transition-colors

components.badges: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ring-1 ring-inset

tables.wrapper: w-full overflow-hidden rounded-xl border border-slate-200 bg-white shadow-sm
tables.header: bg-slate-50/50 text-slate-500 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider border-b border-slate-100

dashboard.instructions: Create a unified dashboard. Top section: 4 stats cards (Total Active, On Track, Delayed, Completed). Middle: Search + Filters (Customer, Stage, Status). Bottom: 'Delivery Phases' table using the custom table component style. Use Status Badges for stage/status columns.

customer.instructions: Customer 360 view. Left column (1/3): Customer Profile Card (Logo, Name, Industry, ARR, Contract Dates). Right column (2/3): Tabs for 'Running Deliveries' and 'Past Deliveries'. Use Card components for Running Deliveries list.

delivery.instructions: Sequential Flowchart View. Top: Header with ID and Status. Middle: A horizontal 'Pipeline' visualization showing 8 stages: [Data Intake, QC, Pre-processing, Span Labeling, Veg Mgmt, Audit, Delivery, Sign-off]. Highlight the current stage (e.g., Span Labeling). Bottom: Details of the current stage.

workflow.instructions: Focus on 'Span Labeling' stage. Left: Task description and requirements. Right: 3-step vertical stepper workflow: 1. Share Requirement (Action), 2. Accept Labelling (Action), 3. Submit Shapefile (Upload). Bottom: Audit Log Timeline showing history of actions.

universal_guidelines: Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, stick to clean white/slate.
Use ample whitespace (p-6, p-8) inside cards.
Mock data should be realistic utility company names (e.g., 'Pacific Power', 'Midwest Grid').
